be.description: Defines an essential or inherent state of existence or identity.

at.description: Defines spatial, temporal, or contextual presence.

communicate.description: Expresses a message or transmits information, externally or internally.

react.description: Captures a response or emotional feedback to a stimulus or state.

relate.description: Establishes a relationship or association between entities.

use.description: Describes the application or utility of something possessed or available.

work.description: Denotes activity involving effort, often with goals, collaboration, or output.

think.description: Represents internal cognitive processes, self-reflection or internal dialogue.

friend.description: A type of human relationship with trust and mutual support.

travel.description: Movement or transition across space or time.
